E-Stamping

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1579928757238{margin-top: -40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

E-stamping is an online method of paying nonjudicial stamp duty to the government. Online stamping has replaced the traditional ways of paying stamp duty charges including physical stamp paper

E stamping facility is available in the following branches of GSC Bank:

BRANCH ADDRESS
NARANPURA SARDAR VALLABHBHAI PATEL SAHAKAR BHAVAN NR. SHASTRINAGAR BRTS BUS STAND, NARANPURA, AHMEDABAD – 380013
NARODA AVANI ICON, GROUND FLOOR, SHOP NO.29 TO 32, OPP.AVANI SKY / SWAMINARAYAN TEMPLE, HARIDARSHAN CROSS ROAD, NARODA, AHMEDABAD – 382330
MANINAGAR BRANCH B-51 RADHAVALLABH COLONY, JAIHIND CROSS ROAD, MANINAGAR, AHMEDABAD – 380008
SCIENCE CITY GROUND FLOOR, SHOP NO:1-2, AADITYA ELIGANCE-2, NEAR BHARAT PETROL PUMP, IN FRONT OF KIRAN MOTORS, SCIENCE CITY, SOLA, AHMEDABAD – 380060
PALDI GROUND FLOOR, AAKASHGANGA COMPLEX, SUVIDHA CHAR RASTA, PALDI, AHMEDABAD – 380007

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1579928750885{margin-top: -40px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”4607″ img_size=”medium” style=”vc_box_shadow_3d”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
